10B
Testamenm̃ Robti Moger ꝑbatm̃ viij die May Anno dom̃ 1561.
In the name of god Amen I Robt Moger of the parishe of
Gillinghã beyng whole of mynd & memorie thanks be vnto
almyghty god & sycke yn my body the xv. of ffebruarie
the year of oꝛ lord 1559. do make & ordayne my last wyll and
testamet̃ after thys manꝛ & forme folowyng fyrst I do gyve and
bequeath my soule vnto almyghty god to oꝛ blessed lady saynt
marie the virgyne and to all the blessed company of theabey
& my body to be buaryed yn the churche yeard of Gyllingham
Itm̃ I do gyve to the mother churche of Briston ijd And I do
gyve vnto the hygh Altare of Gyllinghã vjd And I gyve to
the wode lyght ijd Itm̃ I gyve & bequeath vnto Margarete Marshe
my daughter one cowe And vnto Edith Moger my sons daughter
a reade heafer & a crocke & a crocke & a pan Also I do gyve &
bequeath vnto Iohn Moger & vnto Robert Moger my sonnes
chyldren to eche of them one steare bullocke of one yere aige
And I do gyve vnto Osmund Moger my sonnes son a mare colte
Also I do gyve vnto Edith Moger the yonger of my sonnes daughters
one brynded heafer of one yeres aige And I do gyve vnto Katheryn
Moger my sonnes Daughter the beste cowes calf to be waned and
kept to her ꝑfyt & vse. And to Iohn Moger my sonnes son a calf
to be waned ij. yeres hereafter for the chylds ꝑfyt & vse. And I
gyve vnto Iohn Newman my daughters son one calf to be waned
for hym a thre yeres hereafter for hys ꝑfyt & vse. And to every god
chyld ijd. The resydew of my goods my Debtes payed I gyve and
bequeath vnto my son Richard Moger whom I do make & ordayne to
be my heole & sole executꝛ And I make my overseers Edward
Shepeherd & Nicholas Brewer wytne wytnisses to thys
wyll Thomas Kyng prieste Matthew Nayler wͭ other
